parameter.name: ipAddress
parameter.label: Network Address
parameter.description: Enter the IP address of the iTach Flex device

parameter.name: mapFilename
parameter.label: Map File
parameter.description: Enter name of file containing mapping of commands to IR and Serial codes

parameter.name: activeCable
parameter.label: Active Cable
parameter.description: This setting should match the Current Active Cable in the Flex configuration

parameter.name: sensorPollInterval
parameter.label: Sensor Polling Interval
parameter.description: Interval in seconds at which sensors on Relay/Sensor cable should be polled (0=Polling off)

parameter.name: sensorNotifyPort
parameter.label: Sensor Notification Multicast Port
parameter.description: UDP port number for multicast notifications of sensor status changes from Relay/Sensor cable (0=disabled)

parameter.name: eomDelimiter1
parameter.label: End-of-message Delimiter
parameter.description: URL encoded end-of-message delimiter string for receiving messages
